data.actual_result: It closes the popout and does not update the popout's location on the screen.
data.expected_result: The popout should remain open when maximized or minimized and dynamically update it's location in the app when the window is resized.
data.short_description: In the new Games tab, the game popout will disappear when maximizing or minimizing the window, and will not dynamically move itself when the window is resized.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have the Games tab experiment. (This is the hardest step.) - Open a game so it displays in the Quick Launcher - Click above the play button on the game. - Maximize or minimize the window. - Reopen the popout and then try to resize the window.
